Question: This person performed "King Tut" on the April 22, 1978, edition of SNL.
Hints: This person began working local clubs at night, to mixed notices, and at twenty-one he dropped out of college.
At age 67, this person became a first-time dad when Stringfield gave birth to a baby girl in December 2012.
Expressing his affection through gifts of cars, bikes, etc., this person's father was stern, and not emotionally open to his son.
